MonsterTrait.Name: Ice Walk
MonsterTrait.Text: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn’t cost it extra moment.

MonsterTrait.Name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) cold damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Tail
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Frightful Presence
MonsterTrait.Text: Each creature of the dragon’s choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon’s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

MonsterTrait.Name: Cold Breath (Recharge 5–6)
MonsterTrait.Text: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The dragon can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

MonsterTrait.Name: Detect
MonsterTrait.Text: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

MonsterTrait.Name: Tail Attack
MonsterTrait.Text: The dragon makes a tail attack.

MonsterTrait.Name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
MonsterTrait.Text: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.
